title: i'm tired of all of the racism surrounding girl gamers
body:
deal with it guys, us girls are here to stay and you need to get over it.

i shouldn't have to change what i'm wearing just because i want to stream, if i want to wear a low cut top i'm going to wear it and no i'm not a slut just because i choose to wear one.

i shouldn't have to hide my name in fear of being harassed by thirsty males, i shouldn't be forced to use voice changers or not talk at all because guys will constantly sexually harass me over voice chat and in chat...

please stop.
